title: Grilled monkfish cheeks with umeboshi and shiso dressing
description: You’ll need a trip to a top-notch fishmonger and a decent Japanese food shop to source the ingredients for this dish, but it should be worth the effort.
ingredients: 25g/1oz fresh root ginger, grated with juice
50g/1¾oz umeboshi paste (made from pickled ume fruits), available from specialist Japanese suppliers
